original_title: AKA Sarah Keller: Cinzia Monreale Remembers 'The Beyond'
overview: Actress Cinzea Monreale guides viewers through her cult roles - most noticeably as the mysterious blind girl Emily in Lucio Fulci's classic haunted house film The Beyond (1981).
title: AKA Sarah Keller: Cinzia Monreale Remembers 'The Beyond'
